Content: Eight suspects including notorious elephant racketeer Samarppulige Niraj Roshan alias Ali Roshan have been enlarged on bail. The bail order was given by the Colombo high Court.The High Court had released each of the suspects on a cash bail of Rs 25,000 each and two surety bails each worth Rs 5 million. The three judge bench releasing them on bail said that they were being granted bail as the Attorney General was not against granting them bail. The judge bench fixed the case for further hearing on the 30th of this month.
